## PreviousSlideComponent.(constructor)

Constructs a new PreviousSlideComponent. This Component can be added to an entity. When the entity is clicked, the previous slide will be shown.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(entity: Entity, slides: Slides);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  entity | Entity | The entity that will be clicked to show the previous slide |
|  slides | [Slides](./dcl-slides.slides.md) | The slide show that will be shown |
